Name: Georgia Mint Julep
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: ADD first 5 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice. TOP with soda, briefly stir and serve.
Review: Bourbon, peach and mint flavours combine harmoniously in this cooling cocktail.
History: This classic was originally made with peach brandy in place of peach liqueur. It is also sometimes made with apricot brandy.
